questions.question: What is the primary color of the USB-C to Ethernet adapter's housing?
What type of connector is visible on the adapter's end?
What is the shape of the main adapter body?
What material appears to constitute the adapter's outer casing?
Describing the texture of the adapter's top surface, is it smooth or textured?
What kind of cable is attached to the adapter?
What is the connector type on the cable's other end?
How many ventilation slots are present on the adapter's top?
Considering the cable's length, would you call it short or long?
What is the apparent overall condition of the adapter, new or used?
Regarding the cable, is it flexible or rigid in appearance?
Considering the Ethernet port, is it a standard RJ45 size?
What is the orientation of the ventilation slots, vertical or horizontal?
Is the adapter's cable showing signs of twisting or kinks?
Judging by the image, does the adapter seem bulky or compact?
